result.execSummary:
All charges against Jermaine M Norwood in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Jermaine M Norwood is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jermaine M Norwood

records.addlTxt: Defense Notice of Completion of Representation, filed.
Cash bail  check packet. DZ

Case recalled at 10:14am, same appearances.
Case is set for Jury Trial. Defense ready to proceed. State's essential witness failed to appear.  State has no alternative theory of prosecution. Defense motion to Dismiss is GRANTED by the Court without prejudice. Defendant released from conditions of bail and any bail on deposit to be returned to the person who posted it.

Defendant Jermaine M Norwood in court with attorney Danielle L. Shelton.  Lara Parker appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: KKO
Case in court for jury trial. Defense is ready to proceed. State needs to try and contact victim once more and requests case be passed. Court will pass case for 15 mintues.
Pretrial Services Supervision Report received and filed, forwarded to Judge for review.
State's Witness List received and filed.
State's Motions in Limine received and filed.
State's Jury instructions received and filed.

Defendant Jermaine M Norwood in court with attorney Danielle L. Shelton.  Alicia H Kort appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: KKO  
Case in court for final pretrial. Case remains in trial posture, speedy demand is moot. Court addresses Justice Point report. Parties advised by the court they need to file any motions in limine, witness lists and jury instructions by 12/8/2017. Jury trial remains calendared on 12/13/2017 at 9:00am, Branch 45.
Pretrial Services Supervision Report received and filed, forwarded to Judge for review

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

17RM083047  Actual Date Bond Posted with Sheriff:
11/09/2017

Attorney Danielle L. Shelton in court, defendant Jermaine M Norwood not in court, in custody.  Lara Parker appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: KKO  
Case in court for scheduling Conference. Defense requests a speedy demand trial. Court grants defense request.  Court ordered matter adjourned back to Branch 45.  Final pre-trial scheduled for December 6, 2017 at 01:30 pm.  Jury trial scheduled for December 13, 2017 at 09:00 am.

Defendant advised No Contact Order remains in full force and effect.  Defendant to have no contact with Antonine K.  Court advised defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Court orders defendant TURNED OVER to JUSTICE Point for Supervision. DEFENDANT to be monitored by drug testing. All previous orders as to bail to continue. Defendant advised if released from custody it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.
Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping, a warrant issued or high cash bail.
Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Kies, Branch 45.

Defendant Jermaine M Norwood in court with attorney Danielle L. Shelton.  Defendant Jermaine M Norwood in custody.  William G Davidson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Scheduling conference scheduled for November 3, 2017 at 08:30 am.

Prior: 3721 North 1st Street, Milwaukee, WI 53212
Defendant's Bail Forfeiture Notice returned undeliverable.

Signature bond ordered to be forfeited in the amount of 500.00.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH  WARRANT.

Defendant Jermaine M Norwood in court with attorney Zoe Everett.  Jennifer L Pickett appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued.  Court ordered any bail posted to be forfeited.  State's motion for Judgment of Bond Forfeiture 30 days after notification from the Clerk of Circuit Court's Office is granted by the Court.  

Court ordered Jury Trial date of April 25, 2016 at 9:00am VACATED.

JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed.

Defendant Jermaine M Norwood in court with attorney Zoe Everett.  Kelly O'Neill appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case in court for plea hearing. Defense requests final pre-trial and jury trial dates.  Final pre-trial scheduled for March 31, 2016 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for April 25, 2016 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Jermaine M Norwood in court with attorney Zoe Everett.  Kelly O'Neill appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case in court for plea hearing. For reasons stated on the record, Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea in Branch 31.  Plea hearing scheduled for December 23, 2015 at 08:30 am.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed.

Defendant Jermaine M Norwood in court with attorney Zoe Everett.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC.

Defense counsel has received discovery and offer, additional time to review with her client. Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea in Branch 31.  All parties are notified that effective 12-01-15 this case will be assigned to Reserved Branch, Branch 31, in Room 615 of the Courthouse. Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date is signed and filed.  Plea hearing scheduled for December 8, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Justice Point Pretrial Services Report dated November 13, 2015; received and filed.

Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with Antonine K.
  Court advised defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.
Court orders defendant TURNED OVER to JUSTICE Point for Supervision to be monitored by drug testing.

Defendant Jermaine M Norwood in court with attorney Daniel E Meylink.  Defendant Jermaine M Norwood in custody.  Brandon A Wigley appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk:  hgj.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Dee, Branch 37.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for November 16, 2015 at 08:30 am.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE ARREST WARRANT.

Defendant Jermaine M Norwood not in court.  David T. Malone appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered an Arrest Warrant to be issued.  Court ordered any bail posted to be forfeited.  State's motion for Judgment of Bond Forfeiture 30 days after notification from the Clerk of Circuit Court's Office is granted by the Court.  Court makes finding that there is a possible victim identified, therefore, Court stays order of forfeiture with recompense to be determined at close of case.vb
